Woods.text: You find a sleeping Sheldon Gang member near the still. Make a Sneak (-2) check to try to swipe the shotgun he has dropped on the ground. If you pass, take a Shotgun from the Common Item deck if there is one. If you fail, the guard awakens. You are cought and beaten, losing 2 Stamina, but you escape with your life. Move to the street.

YeOldeMagickShoppe.text: There is an old, locked trunk for sale for $5. If you buy it, make a Luck(0) check and consult the chart below. Success. 0) Empty! 1) Gold coins! roll 2 dice, add them together, and gain that much money. 2+) Jackpot! Draw 2 Unique Items!

StMarysHospital.text: You agree to undergo an experimental treatment. Roll a die. On a 1 to 3, gain that many Stamina. On a 4 to 6, nothing happens.
